title: Lazy Lester - Rides Again (1987; 2011) [FLAC]
description:
2011 expanded CD edition

Tracks 1-12 original vinyl

Tracks 13-23 previously unreleased bonus tracks

all tracks recorded 1987 from May 25 to 27
